STAGING linked service_accountKey.metadata: Secure string for 'accountKey' of 'STAGING linked service'

properties.description: Moving CRM data to MS SQL DB
Moving CRM data to MS SQL DB

source.query:
select
   at.*,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(AT.subservice, ',', numbers.n), ',', -1) SubService_NEW
from
  (select 1 n union all
   select 2 union all select 3 union all
   select 4 union all select 5 union all
   select 6 union all select 7 union all
   select 8 union all select 9) numbers INNER JOIN slt_test.Account_subservice at
  on CHAR_LENGTH(AT.subservice)
     -CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(AT.subservice, ',', ''))>=numbers.n-1

source.query:
select
   at.*,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(AT.subservice, ',', numbers.n), ',', -1) SubService_NEW
from
  (select 1 n union all
   select 2 union all select 3 union all
   select 4 union all select 5 union all
   select 6 union all select 7 union all
   select 8 union all select 9) numbers INNER JOIN slt_test.Opportunity_subservice at
  on CHAR_LENGTH(AT.subservice)
     -CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(AT.subservice, ',', ''))>=numbers.n-1

SELECT
cast(angebotnr AS SIGNED) AS "Quote number",
Q.*,
max(version) AS "Latest version" FROM angebot Q
GROUP BY angebotnr
ORDER BY `Quote number` ASC

select
   at.*,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(AT.inhalt, ';', numbers.n), ';', -1) INHALT_NEW
from
  (select 1 n union all
   select 2 union all select 3 union all
   select 4 union all select 5 union all
   select 6 union all select 7 union all
   select 8 union all select 9) numbers INNER JOIN ausgangsrechnung_textmodul at
  on CHAR_LENGTH(AT.inhalt)
     -CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(AT.inhalt, ';', ''))>=numbers.n-1

select
   at.*,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(AT.inhalt, ';', numbers.n), ';', -1) INHALT_NEW
from

   select 2 union all select 3 union all
   select 4 union all select 5 union all
   select 6 union all select 7 union all
   select 8 union all select 9) numbers INNER JOIN auftragjob_textmodul at
  on CHAR_LENGTH(AT.inhalt)
     -CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(AT.inhalt, ';', ''))>=numbers.n-1

select 
 MitarbeiterID

,StundenerfassungPreis,
Zahlungsfrist,
arbeitsverhaeltnis,
FirstJob,
externalid
from `mitarbeiter`
